sense.def: there was an N who V-ed
be slow to move, be lethargic, be phlegmatic
SHI: lower garment (particularly those worn below the yī 衣 "upper clothes" 毛傳：在下曰裳
be burnt, have been burnt; get burnt
there is an N to which S applies 有一事見之已久 "there is a matter which I have seen a long time ago"
desire to, aim to; would like to

articulate, express; propose; maintain, propose as true; pronounce on, speak up on, speak of (other's bad points); (abstractly) speak of (orally or in writing); inform of; suggest (often formally at court)
be very much afraid that S, live in fear that S
the lexically determinate N's ruler; [one's] ruler; [one's own] ruler
the lexically determinate N's ruler; [one's] ruler; [one's own] ruler
speak up on a contextually determinate matter
be very much afraid that S, live in fear that S
without indication of place of injury: get injured
the lexically determinate N's ruler; [one's] ruler; [one's own] ruler
So then; this being so then
unmarked nominalisation: to speak up on N
(of things) be morally right; be quite appropriate to the occasion
unmarked nominalisation: to speak up on N
(of things) be morally right; be quite appropriate to the occasion
ask and say (: "...", with direct object without yuē 曰)
cause to burn, set fire to; (slash and) burn; burn up so as to destroy
pick up (what is lying around); snatch
(primarily visible, outer) clothes (worn on the upper part of the body)
go out, be extinguished (as of lamps or candles)
perceive visually; witness, come across; lay one's eyes on; focus and perceive properly; come across; notice; visualise intellectually; occasionally: imagine, have a vision of (ghosts)
witness, be aware of, gain knowledge of, notice
you surely should, why don't you
"the relevant N, that relevant N, the N in question, the N involved"
I (on the other hand), I for my part, I as opposed to others
(rarely with indirect speech or quasi indirect speech) say S; say that S
you, my ruler; your lordship; you, my master
the lexically determinate N's ruler; [one's] ruler; [one's own] ruler
as one pleases; in an unrestrained manner
as one pleases; in an unrestrained manner

seg.line: 而子獨以夷狄道教寡人
